intro: Aeschynanthus kermesinus, commonly known as the red-veined ivy or the flame ivy, is a flowering plant native to western Africa. Aeschynanthus kermesinus is often cultivated as a decorative plant due to its ornamental value and ability to thrive in hanging baskets or as a trailing plant.
